description: The New York City Cycling Map is an annual free publication of DOT. Over 375,000 are distributed annually at bicycle shops, libraries, and schools. DOT also distributes geodata of NYC bike routes. This is an ESRI shapefile/map of the bike lanes exclusively in the Bronx.

name: Bronx Bike Lanes
